project_abstract.cdata: The Guangxi Highway Project in China, will provide cost-effective inter-provincial transport links among land-locked provinces, and stimulate economic development, reduce poverty, and thus reduce regional disparities. The components include: 1) expansion of the highway capacity, through partial construction of the National Trunk Highway System, connecting the Shuiren, and Nanning provinces, as well as those roads connecting into the corridor; 2) maintenance and rehabilitation of the highway system is included, particularly for those rural roads, in relatively poor areas; 3) highway safety will be improved, through the upgrade of the most dangerous road sections in sub-urban areas of the Nanning, and Wuming provinces, and other selected road segments; and, 4) the Guangxi Communications Department's capacity will be strengthened, through support, and training on project planning, design, construction, and supervision. Further support is included for project management, and monitoring of environmental, and resettlement plans.

P058843.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>广西公路项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>水任－南宁公路是广西公路项目的主要内容。这条新公路将把比较贫穷的内陆省份贵州省、云南省、四川省和重庆市与广西自治区的北海市、防城港市以及广东省的湛江市等南部海港城市连接起来，开辟一条更近、更快的入海路线。这条新公路将通过发展商业、贸易和旅游业促进这个中国最贫困的地区之一的经济增长，项目影响广泛，受益人口近400万，其中百分之80为少数民族。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
